excerpt: Quirky spot for steam power exhibits, with mini replicas of trains, riverboats & other machines.
detail_description: Mundo a Vapor is a unique theme park that showcases various miniature steam-powered machines in full operation. Visitors can marvel at mini replicas of paper mills, potteries, blacksmith shops, steel foundries, and more. One of its notable features is the facade displaying a life-sized reenactment of the famous 1895 train accident at Montparnasse station in Paris.
name: Mundo a Vapor
address: Av. Don Luiz Guanella, 1247 - São José, Canela - RS, 95683-550, Brazil

excerpt: Lively amusement park offering attractions such as rollercoasters, zip lines & 4-wheelers.
detail_description: Alpen Park is a vibrant amusement park set in 60,000 square meters of green space with views of the typical Serra Gaucha valley. It offers a wide range of leisure activities, from amusement park rides to extreme sports. The main attraction is the Alpine Coaster, where visitors control the speed of their descent down the mountain on 37 sleds.
name: Alpen Park
address: Rodovia Arnaldo Oppitz, 901 - São João, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Park with hiking trails, a tower & a cable car offering views of the famed 130-m. Caracol Falls.
detail_description: Caracol Park, located in Canela, is a must-visit destination known for its iconic Caracol Waterfall. The park offers hiking trails and a 30-meter tower with a panoramic elevator providing a 360-degree view of the surroundings. Visitors can also enjoy the breathtaking views of the 130-meter Caracol Falls from a cable car.
name: Caracol Park
address: Rodovia RS 466, km 0, s/n, Caracol, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Catedral de Pedra in Canela is a must-visit for travelers seeking a romantic escape or outdoor adventure. This neo-gothic cathedral, Igreja Matriz de Nossa Senhora de Lourdes, boasts stunning stained glass windows and towering columns. Visitors can explore the charming Rua Coberta nearby, lined with eateries and artisanal shops. For a cultural experience, Casa da Cultura offers museum exhibits and art displays.
name: Catedral de Pedra Canela - Sonho de Natal
address: Praça Matriz, 69 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Old Hollywood–themed museum with gift shop, displaying classic American cars from the 1920s & '60s.
detail_description: Hollywood Dream Cars - Automobile Museum is a vintage car museum with an Old Hollywood theme, showcasing classic American cars from the 1920s to the 1960s. The museum offers visitors a glimpse into the glamour of Hollywood's golden years, featuring automobiles that captivated artists, presidents, and personalities worldwide. It's a must-visit destination for car enthusiasts and those interested in experiencing the allure of vintage Hollywood.
name: Hollywood Dream Cars - Automobile Museum
address: Avenida das Hortênsias, R. Vigilante, 4151, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Portraits of Abraham Lincoln, Albert Einstein & other noted figures on display at this wax museum.
detail_description: Dreamland Wax Museum, opened in 2009, has become a classic attraction in Gramado. With around a hundred lifelike wax figures on display, visitors can see iconic personalities like Shrek and Sergio Reis almost side by side. The museum offers a piece of Hollywood with its collection of portraits featuring Abraham Lincoln, Albert Einstein, and other notable figures.
name: Dreamland Wax Museum
address: Av. das Hortênsias, 5507 - Ipê Amarelo, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Historic home with preserved vintage furnishings, a gift shop & 2 tea rooms serving apple pie.
detail_description: Nestled in the charming town of Canela, Castelinho Caracol is a historic home turned museum that showcases vintage furnishings and utensils from a bygone era. The main attraction here is the tea house, where visitors can indulge in one of Brazil's best apfelstrudels. For those looking to simply savor the delicious dessert, there's an option to order it for takeout without paying museum entry.
name: Castelinho Caracol
address: RS - 466, Estr. Parque dos Pinheiros, s/n - Km 03, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Parque das Sequoias is a beautiful private park in Canela, Brazil, known for its immense collection of redwood specimens. The park offers well-maintained trails and a variety of old-growth trees, including the Sequoias, which are considered the tallest trees in the world. Each tree is numbered and cataloged, with informational plaques provided to visitors. The park also features picnic areas and parking facilities.
name: Parque das Sequoias
address: R. Godofredo Raimundo, 1747 - Sequoias, Canela - RS, 95682-250, Brazil

detail_description: Churrascaria Garfo e Bombacha - Noite Gaúcha offers a self-service system where you can choose from a variety of dishes to accompany the 8-hour roasted rib, including capeletti soup, an array of special cheeses and cured meats, abundant salad bar, traditional hot dishes like carreteiro and assorted grilled meats. The lunch spread also includes fried polenta, lasagna, and grilled cheese among other options.
name: Churrascaria Garfo e Bombacha - Noite Gaúcha
address: RS 466, Caracol - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Relaxed B&B offering airy quarters with free Wi-Fi, plus an outdoor pool with a waterfall & sundeck.
detail_description: Pousada Doce Canela is a charming B&B in the city of Canela, known for its vintage decor and excellent service. The airy rooms are equipped with amenities such as cable TV, ceiling fans, heaters, and minibars. The main mansion dates back to 1981 and holds historical significance. Surrounded by a peaceful wooded environment, the pousada offers a serene retreat with an outdoor pool featuring a waterfall and sundeck.
name: Pousada Doce Canela
address: R. Adolfo Seibt, 61 - São José, Canela - RS, 95683-472, Brazil

detail_description: Matriz Paróquia São Pedro is a must-visit attraction in Gramado, located just 9 km from Canela on the Romantic Route. This stunning church, inaugurated in 1942, is a highlight of the city and a popular tourist spot. The church's beautiful stonemasonry construction and picturesque setting make it a postcard-worthy landmark in the area.
name: Paróquia São Pedro
address: Av. Borges de Medeiros, 2659 - Centro, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Unique outdoor park with intricate miniature replicas of international buildings, plus a cafe.
detail_description: Mini Mundo is a must-visit outdoor park in Gramado, featuring intricate miniature replicas of famous international buildings. This miniature universe has been under construction for over 30 years and showcases detailed replicas of real locations, all at a scale 24 times smaller than the original. The park's central location makes it a popular tourist attraction, with miniatures including the Prince of Monaco's Castle, Curitiba's Botanical Garden, and Porto Alegre's Gasometer.
name: Mini Mundo
address: R. Horácio Cardoso, 291 - Planalto, Gramado - RS, 95675-062, Brazil

detail_description: Dreams Motor Show Gramado is a must-visit for motorcycle enthusiasts, featuring a fantastic museum with dozens of restored machines from different eras. The museum is dedicated to Harley Davidson themed bikes and boasts an impressive collection, including the only replica of the bike model Knucklehead 1946. Visitors can immerse themselves in the ambiance of roaring engines and enjoy the experience at a themed bar within the museum.
name: Dreams Motor Show Gramado
address: Av. das Hortênsias, 5507 - Subsolo, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Amusement park featuring a 7D theater, playground & areas to explore, with themes such as dinosaurs.
detail_description: Florybal Magic Park Land is a must-see attraction in the Canela region, offering a unique and enjoyable experience for visitors of all ages. The park features a variety of activities including a 7D theater, playgrounds, and themed areas such as dinosaurs and stone men. Visitors can also explore a mini cocoa farm, enjoy zip lines, and indulge in the magical atmosphere of the park. Additionally, Florybal Chocolatier offers delicious chocolate samples that are not to be missed.
name: Florybal Magic Park Land
address: Rodovia RS-466, 1630 - Jardim dos Pinheiros II, Canela - RS, 95684-152, Brazil

excerpt: Colorful aerial trams with scenic views of wildlands & a waterfall, plus a cafe & gift shop.
detail_description: The Air Cable Cars Da Serra Parks offer an exhilarating experience as you glide above stunning landscapes, including lush wildlands and a breathtaking waterfall. These colorful aerial trams provide not only a smooth ride but also the chance to soak in panoramic views of the surrounding area. Located near various attractions like Caracol Waterfall and Pine Grosso Park, visitors can enjoy a delightful café and gift shop at the base.
name: Air cable cars Da Serra Parks
address: Rua Constante Félix Orsolin, 699 - Caracol, Canela - RS, CEP, 95684-880, Brazil

excerpt: Canela is a resort town in the Gaúcha mountain range in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil’s southernmost state. Influenced by 19th-century German settlers, the town has Bavarian-style chalets and chocolatiers. It’s known for its Christmas light displays and for its colorful hydrangea blooms in spring. The Gothic Cathedral of Stone, which has 12 bronze bells, stands in the town’s leafy main square, Praça Matriz.
detail_description: Canela is a charming resort town nestled in the Gaúcha mountain range of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. Influenced by its 19th-century German settlers, the town boasts picturesque Bavarian-style chalets and delightful chocolatiers. It's renowned for its enchanting Christmas light displays and vibrant hydrangea blooms during spring. The Gothic Cathedral of Stone, featuring 12 bronze bells, graces the leafy main square, Praça Matriz.
name: Canela
address: RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Ice Bar Mundo Gelado offers a unique experience where visitors can enter an igloo at -25°C during the day to admire ice sculptures. At night, it transforms into an ice bar with two included drinks. The entry ticket allows for a half-hour stay regardless of the time of visit. With over 30 tons of ice throughout the structure, including ice-made glasses, this unusual bar is a must-visit spot for those who enjoy a good and unconventional bar experience.
name: Ice Bar Mundo Gelado
address: Caracol, Rodovia Estadual 466 , 3915, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Recreational body of water ringed with a looped jogging trail through trees & paddle-boat rental.
detail_description: Lago Negro, also known as The Black Lake, is a popular recreational spot surrounded by lush greenery and featuring a looped jogging trail and paddle-boat rentals. This enchanting location offers various tourist attractions such as themed open-air and covered parks, museums, churches, and cultural centers. Visitors can enjoy facilities like cafeterias, restrooms, boat rentals, and souvenir shops. The serene atmosphere makes it an ideal place for relaxation with family or friends.
name: Lago Negro
address: R. Vinte e Cinco de Julho, 439 - Casa Grande, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

detail_description: Selfie Gramado is a vibrant and modern space designed for creating unique and creative content. With over 160 photo spots spread throughout the park, it offers a variety of colorful and themed environments for all tastes and styles. Inspired by popular locations in Japan and the United States, this venue provides immersive displays and perfect lighting for those Instagram-worthy shots.
name: Selfie Gramado
address: Av. das Hortênsias, 5855 - Carniel, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

detail_description: If you are in Canela, you cannot miss visiting Empório Canela, a true refuge that combines a charming bookstore with an antique shop and a craft store. Located next to the famous Stone Cathedral, this cozy bistro offers a unique dining experience with delicious dishes ranging from hot soups to more elaborate options like filet with green apple risotto and gorgonzola.
name: Empório Canela
address: Rua Felisberto Soares, 258 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

name: Gramado Film Festival - RS
address: Vila Suica, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

name: Kempinski Laje de Pedra
address: R. das Flores, 222, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Condomínio Laje de Pedra is a remarkable place surrounded by stunning natural landscapes and serene lakes. It offers an immersive living experience with houses that seem to be from fantasy stories. The location is excellent, positioned conveniently between Canela and Gramado, making it a great choice for travelers wanting to explore both cities.
name: Condomínio Laje de Pedra
address: R. José Marquês Guimarães, 2-4 - Parque das Hortensias, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Rua Coberta, also known as Rua Madre Veronica, is a charming covered street lined with various restaurants, cafes, and shops. It offers an elegant ambiance for visitors to enjoy while being protected from the elements. The street is a popular venue for music shows and fashion presentations, making it a lively spot with daily attractions for both adults and children. Additionally, the location provides a picturesque setting for capturing memorable photos.
name: Rua Coberta Gramado
address: R. Me. Verônica, 30 - Centro, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Gothic-style Catholic church featuring 12 bronze bells made in Italy & a carved wooden altar.
detail_description: Paróquia Nossa Senhora de Lourdes, also known as the Stone Cathedral, is a grand Gothic-style Catholic church located in the center of Canela. The cathedral features an imposing structure and houses 12 bronze bells from Italy, along with a carved wooden altar. Visitors can admire its beauty during the day and witness a captivating illuminated display at night.
name: Paróquia Nossa Senhora de Lourdes | Catedral de Pedra de Canela
address: Praça Matriz, 69 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vitivinícola Jolimont offers a unique enotourism experience, showcasing award-winning wines, excellent sparkling wines, and the elegance of glassware. Founded in 1948 by a visionary Frenchman, this winery invites visitors to indulge their senses in a journey of wine and sparkling wine tasting experiences. Guests can enjoy masterclasses led by knowledgeable hosts and receive a complimentary wine glass with their ticket purchase.
name: Vinícola Jolimont
address: Estrada Morro Calçado, 1420 - Morro Calçado, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Animatronic dinosaurs are scattered around this theme park that also has food stands & a gift shop.
detail_description: Vale dos Dinossauros in Canela is a theme park inspired by the Jurassic Park movies. It features lifelike animatronic dinosaurs that move and make sounds, creating an immersive experience for visitors. In addition to the dinosaur exhibits, the park also offers food stands and a gift shop for visitors to enjoy. Additionally, there are combo tickets available that include access to other attractions in the area such as the Wax Museum, Hollywood Dream Cars, Harley Motor Show, and Super Cars.
name: Vale dos Dinossauros
address: RS 466 - Bosque Sinoserra, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: If you're looking for a unique experience, Captain Frosty World is definitely worth a visit! This chilly attraction will transport you back to the frosty vibes of Michigan, USA. While some may find it a bit on the pricier side considering the duration of the visit, the friendly staff truly enhance your time there. Prepare yourself for an unforgettable adventure in one of the coldest places you'll ever encounter, with temperatures dipping as low as -20°C.
name: Captain Frosty World
address: Rodovia RS-466, 3915 Caracol, Canela - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

excerpt: Cascading 426-ft. waterfall, with a nearby observation tower & a cablecar ride for aerial views.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Canela, Brazil, the stunning Cascata do Caracol is a breathtaking 426-foot waterfall that draws visitors from far and wide. Often mistaken for being in Gramado, this natural wonder is actually part of the renowned Parque do Caracol, which stands as one of southern Brazil's most popular attractions. Surrounded by the lush Floresta de Pinheiros do Planalto Brasileiro, this majestic waterfall offers not only spectacular views but also an array of activities to enjoy.
name: Cascata do Caracol
address: RS- 466, Canela - RS, 95670-000, Brazil

name: Skyglass Canela
address: R. Constante Félix Orsolin, 9800 - Caracol, Canela - RS, 95684-880, Brazil

detail_description: The Beatles Museum is a small attraction that can be explored in about 20 minutes, making it a quick stop for fans of the iconic band. Visitors can enjoy wifi access for sharing their experience instantly. Some guests have suggested adding a large Yellow Submarine outside for photo opportunities and to attract more attention. Despite its size, passionate Beatles fans will appreciate the opportunity to meet the owner at the end of the tour and even get an upgrade with a photo on stage holding instruments.
name: Beatles Museum
address: Av. Don Luiz Guanella, 521 - São José, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Ecoparque Sperry, located in Canela, is a popular attraction perfect for a weekend getaway. While the park no longer allows swimming at the waterfall, it offers well-maintained trails and wheelchair-accessible amenities near the entrance. Visitors can enjoy the beautiful natural surroundings and waterfalls while following organized paths. It's recommended to arrive early to avoid high temperatures. The park also features a nice restaurant for visitors to enjoy after exploring the area.
name: Ecoparque Sperry
address: Vale do Quilombo, Linha 28, Estr. Profa. Elvira A. Benetti, km 05, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Fashion museum with reconstructions of historical women's clothing from the past 4,000 years.
detail_description: The Fashion Museum offers a captivating journey through 4,000 years of women's fashion history. The museum showcases reconstructions of original clothing from different eras, providing insight into the evolution of human culture through attire. With 3,500 square meters dedicated to this exploration, visitors can marvel at original and antique pieces meticulously researched and created for the exhibition.
name: Fashion Museum
address: Av. Ernani Kroeff Fleck, 1810 - Vila Suica, Canela - RS, 95683-555, Brazil

detail_description: Flor do Vale - Alambique e Parque Ecológico is a stunning destination that offers a variety of experiences. Visitors can explore the beautiful Vinicola Jolimont, the charming Cachacaria Flor do Vale, and the incredible Cervejaria do Farol. The park features a magnificent waterfall that can be accessed at its base, providing an immersive natural experience. While there were expectations of encountering native animals like monkeys, they were not found during visits.
name: Flor do Vale - Alambique e Parque Ecológico
address: Estrada Municipal CNL 250, Linha Morro Estrada São João, 2830 Zona Rural, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Big Land is a unique theme park in Canela, offering an interactive experience with giant toys and objects. It's known as the world's first park themed around gigantism, featuring a machine that makes everything appear larger upon entry. The park caters to all ages and provides an opportunity to relive childhood memories through oversized games and toys. Visitors can expect a delightful time exploring the immense creativity behind each masterpiece while enjoying various activities.
name: Big Land | Parque Temático
address: Após último vagão do trem, R. Ernesto Urbani, 7 - Salas 14 e 15 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-216, Brazil

detail_description: The Egyptian Museum of Canela, conceived by the artist Essam Elbattal, is a result of extensive research by renowned international Egyptologists. The museum houses over 400 pieces from the artist's private collection, including an impressive 8-meter high pyramid, mummies, sarcophagi, and mortuary chambers. Additionally, it features replicas of famous historical artifacts found in Egyptian museums.
name: Museu Egípcio Canela
address: Rodovia ERS-466, 5201 - Caracol, Canela - RS, 95684-700, Brazil

detail_description: The ecological park Paredões stands out as an exceptional conservation area, offering unparalleled natural beauty and a rich diversity of flora and fauna. This remarkable park boasts impressive landscapes and exquisite scenery that captivate visitors from all corners of the globe. With its pristine surroundings, it serves as a sanctuary for numerous species, fostering an environment conducive to their preservation. Paredões is renowned for its sustainable practices, promoting environmental awareness and inspiring visitors to appreciate the delicate balance between human activities and the ecosystem.
name: Paredões the park
address: Estr. do Esteinho, 101 - Caracol, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Vinícola Granja Da Telha winery offers a unique and inviting experience. It is a simple yet welcoming place with great wine at affordable prices and no tasting fees. The beautiful outdoor setting makes it perfect for picnics. The company also provides various packages for visitors to enjoy. In addition to their delicious grape juice, they also offer wonderful jellies. The winery's commitment to recycling the juice bottles adds to its appeal.
name: Vinícola Granja Da Telha
address: Rodovia Arnaldo Oppitz, 1350 - Eugênio Ferreira, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Parque Fazenda da Serra offers a remarkable function room facility that is open to the general public. This sensational farm provides an excellent place for various activities such as walking, resting, and horse riding. The establishment boasts a beautiful structure and exceptional service. It is an incredible location with plenty of options to explore and enjoy nature's beauty. With its stunning surroundings and top-notch amenities, Parque Fazenda da Serra is truly a very beautiful place to visit.
name: Parque Fazenda da Serra
address: RS-476, 820 - Distrito Industrial, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Located in the tower of the Catedral de Pedra, Museu Sinos da Catedral offers a magnificent view of the city and an opportunity to delve into the history of the church's construction and its creator, Conego Joao Marchesi. The museum houses the Carrilhao da Independencia, comprised of 12 bronze bells from Italian brand Sinos Crespi, collectively weighing 4 tons.
name: Museu Sinos da Catedral
address: Praça Matriz - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Parque Do Palácio in Canela is an astonishing location that captivates visitors with its breathtaking beauty. This park, abundant with lush greenery and natural wonders, serves as a haven for those seeking tranquility and connection with nature. It provides a safe environment for families to enjoy quality time together, making it the ideal place to create cherished memories. The presence of abandoned-looking objects does not detract from the park's inherent appeal; rather, it adds a touch of uniqueness and intrigue.
name: Parque Do Palácio
address: RS 235, Praça das Nações, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

name: Adventour Brasil
address: Av. Don Luiz Guanella, 1561 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Rio Grande do Sul, Canela Paixão Natural is a stunning destination that captivates visitors with its breathtaking beauty and diverse attractions. This charming municipality offers a plethora of options for tourism and leisure, making it an ideal spot for those seeking adventure or relaxation. With its picturesque landscapes and vibrant culture, Canela Paixão Natural stands out as one of the most enchanting cities in the region, inviting travelers to explore its many wonders.
name: Canela Paixão Natural
address: Vila Suica, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Ruínas do Cassino, a symbol of nostalgia and the passage of time, stands as a top attraction. These ruins, remnants of an erstwhile grand casino, evoke memories of an era long gone. With its crumbling walls and weathered structure, it embodies the decay and abandonment that has befallen it over the years. Serving as a poignant reminder of past opulence and extravagance, this historical site beckons visitors to reflect on bygone days through its silent yet powerful presence.
name: Ruínas do Cassino
address: Av. Palace Hotel, 160 - Eugênio Ferreira, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

excerpt: Scenic forested park with hiking/cycling trails, a visitor center & picturesque scenery.
name: National Forest Canela
address: R. Otaviano Amaral Píres, N° 5000 - Cxp. Postal 82 - Ulisses de Abreu, Canela - RS, 95686-690, Brazil

detail_description: Museu do Caminhão | American Old Trucks is a unique museum in Brazil that showcases over 60 vintage trucks and pickups, some of which are over 70 years old. Spanning across a 3,000m2 area, the collection includes both national and international vehicles, grouped by manufacturer and meticulously restored for display. One of the highlights is a shining example of the renowned FNM (also known as Feneme).
name: Museu do Caminhão | American Old Trucks
address: Rodovia ERS-466, 1620 - Caracol, Canela - RS, 95684-700, Brazil

name: Cascata do Gavião Faiado
address: Rodovia Arnaldo Oppitz, 7504 - Eugênio Ferreira, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

name: Museu de Figuras de Terror
address: 02560 linha Benetti Linha Benetti, R. Chapadão, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil

detail_description: Space Adventure Canela, also known as the NASA Museum, offers visitors a chance to experience the journey of astronauts who ventured to the moon through simulators. The museum boasts one of the largest collections of original NASA artifacts, including items like the Apollo 11 capsule. Additionally, it features a state-of-the-art planetarium with a 4k audiovisual experience. Visitors can explore real NASA equipment and detailed explanations about space exploration.
name: Space Adventure Canela
address: Av. Ernani Kroeff Fleck, 960 - Vila Suica, Canela - RS, 95684-180, Brazil

name: Aquarismo experience
address: Rua praça da matriz, 80 - Sala 23 - Centro, Canela - RS, 95680-000, Brazil
